lessonName: The Big Story: Creation to Restoration

sections.label: What part of this story excites you most?
options: The problem of sin and brokenness

responses.God’s perfect creation: It's amazing to imagine a world just as God intended — full of beauty, peace, and purpose.
responses.The problem of sin and brokenness: This reminds us why we need a Savior. It’s powerful to see God’s plan even in the pain.
responses.How Jesus rescues us: This is the heart of the story — Jesus stepping into our mess to save and restore us.
responses.The hope of restoration: The ending is actually a new beginning — full of hope, healing, and a world made new.
